summary: A FedEx invoice dated October 14, 2002, for account number 1144-2081-6, billed to Jeffrey E. Epstein at 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY. The document details shipping charges for 12 shipments sent between October 2-9, 2002, from Epstein's address to various recipients, including Ghislaine Maxwell and other associates or entities.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The FedEx account is billed to him at 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY. Multiple shipments are sent from this address under his name.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as the recipient of a FedEx Standard Overnight package sent from Jeffrey Epstein's address on October 7, 2002, to Beverly Hills, CA.

persons.name: S. Griffis
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 3, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to 'Epstein Interests' at the same Madison Ave address.

persons.name: L. Melick
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 7, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to an address in Palm Beach Gardens, FL.

persons.name: N. Lemus
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 7, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to 'Admissions Emporeris College' in Santa Monica, CA.

persons.name: W. Doulin
persons.context: Signed for two packages: one delivered on October 9, 2002, to 'The Villard House' at 457 Madison Ave, and another on October 4, 2002, to 'Epstein Intrust' at the same address.

persons.name: B. Smith
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 8, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to an address in West Palm Beach, FL.

persons.name: I. Childs
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 9, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to a passport service lockbox in Pittsburgh, PA, addressed to Lauren Kwintner.

persons.name: C. Cox
persons.context: Signed for a package delivered on October 8, 2002, sent from Jeffrey Epstein to Casey Wasserman in Beverly Hills, CA.

persons.name: Lauren Kwintner
persons.context: Listed as the recipient (Passport Supervisor) for a package sent to a passport service lockbox in Pittsburgh, PA.

persons.name: Casey Wasserman
persons.context: Listed as the recipient of a FedEx Standard Overnight package sent from Jeffrey Epstein's address on October 7, 2002, to Beverly Hills, CA.

connections.description: Epstein sent a FedEx package to Maxwell at a Beverly Hills address, indicating a logistical or personal connection.
Epstein sent a FedEx package to Wasserman at a Beverly Hills address.
Epstein sent a package to Kwintner, a passport supervisor, via a passport service lockbox, suggesting a business or travel-related connection.

events.title: FedEx Shipping Activity
events.description: A series of 12 FedEx shipments were sent from Jeffrey Epstein's New York address to various recipients across the US, including Ghislaine Maxwell, Casey Wasserman, and addresses in Florida, California, and New Mexico.

locations: 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022-6843 (Jeffrey Epstein's primary address)
358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
1807 B. Wilshire Blvd., Santa Monica, CA 90403 (Admissions Emporeris College)
500 Ross St RM 151-067, Pittsburgh, PA 15219 (Passport Service Lockbox)
The Villard House, 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022
Epstein Intrust, 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022
Epstein Interests, 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's FedEx account (1144-2081-6) was active and used for multiple shipments in October 2002.
Ghislaine Maxwell is listed as a recipient of a package sent from Epstein's New York address to Beverly Hills, CA, in October 2002.
The invoice shows shipments to Epstein-associated entities at his own Madison Ave address: 'Epstein Interests', 'Epstein Intrust', and 'The Villard House'.
Shipments were sent to various locations, including Epstein's Palm Beach, FL residence and to a passport service, indicating travel-related activity.
The document provides a detailed log of Epstein's logistical and financial activity during this period, linking him to specific individuals and addresses.
